chatSystemNetwork

Class ChatNIDatagramSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • chatSystemNetwork.ChatNIDatagramSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ChatNIDatagramSender
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class is responsible for sending all UDP datagram The only messages that it can't send are FilePart messages
    Author:
    joanna
